title: Could we get a limited edition ward skin to go with the new DJ Sona Ultimate Skin???

embed.description: Get ready to take center stage on the Rift!

body:
Hi Riot!

I have no idea if this is happening or not. but is there any chance a DJ ward skin can be designed for when the release of DJ sona is done?
Sona being a support I think it would be a really cool idea, was thinking it could be like a speaker with colored sound waves coming from in or something :D

replies.body: That's so awesome omg. PLEASE RIOT!!!

Yes please.

Oh my gosh the skin is actually so amazing, I'm just in awe. How am I supposed to sleep now? D:
